welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. Matthews, the charming and vibrant city in the heart of the United States! Known for its rich history and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bowman Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louisville International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Louisville International Airport is dedicated to cargo and private aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Godman AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Godman AAF Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
